name: invoice-scanner-backend
description: Backend Lambda functions for serverless invoice scanner

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.package: npm run package:upload && npm run package:process && npm run package:extract && npm run package:get
scripts.package:upload: mkdir -p dist/upload && cp -r lib/upload/* dist/upload/ && cp -r lib/shared dist/upload/ && cd dist/upload && npm install --production
scripts.package:process: mkdir -p dist/process && cp -r lib/process/* dist/process/ && cp -r lib/shared dist/process/ && cd dist/process && npm install --production
scripts.package:extract: mkdir -p dist/extract && cp -r lib/extract/* dist/extract/ && cp -r lib/shared dist/extract/ && cd dist/extract && npm install --production
scripts.package:get: mkdir -p dist/get && cp -r lib/get/* dist/get/ && cp -r lib/shared dist/get/ && cd dist/get && npm install --production
